function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited physical locations may lead to overcrowding and congestion in the area, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, potential public health concern","Mitigation":"Implement a reservation system, manage customer flow, and ensure adequate distancing measures","Technologies":"Queue management apps, contactless payment systems, and location-tracking apps","People":"Customers, staff, and local community","Owner":"Food truck operators, local authorities"},{"Description":"Promotion of specific days and times for food truck visits may lead to a concentration of customers at those times, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the disease during peak hours, potential public health concern","Mitigation":"Stagger promotional days and times, encourage off-peak visits, and provide incentives for spread-out attendance","Technologies":"Online scheduling tools, customer loyalty programs, and targeted marketing campaigns","People":"Customers, staff, and local community","Owner":"Food truck operators, local authorities"},{"Description":"Collaboration with a local store may lead to shared facilities and increased interaction among customers, raising the risk of contagious disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to shared space and facilities, potential public health concern","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, promote outdoor dining, and limit shared facilities usage","Technologies":"Sanitization stations, outdoor seating management systems, and contactless ordering systems","People":"Customers, staff, and local community","Owner":"Food truck operators, local authorities"}]}
